BBK01.SU0520: Deposit rates of banks / Savings deposits with higher rates of return, with agreed notice of 3 months, without a duration of contract being agreed, less than EUR 5,000 / Highest rate of spread
General: Up to December 2001, deposits of less than DM 10,000. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range.
